DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the meta-analysis was to explore the efficacy of eltrombopag versus placebo (standard of care)
DOC.detailed_description: Meta-analysis of three studies: Bussell 2007 & Bussell 2009 & RAISE (TRA102537).
DOC.criteria: Adults with ITP Received a prespecified treatment Prospective clinical studies with at least 10 patients Subjects with ITP due to other causes
